Text.Language: Tenouwst m~Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#: qen ]metouai n~te ]oucia~: ouoh n~tenws e~bol nem ni,eroubim: je ,~ouab ,~ouab ,~ouab n~yok Po#c#. Ke nun ke a~i~ ke ic touc e~w~nac twn e~w~nwn: a~m/n.

We worship the Father, and the Son and the Holy Spirit, one in essence. And we proclaim and say with the cherubim, â€œHoly, Holy, Holy are You O Lord.â€? Now and ever and unto the ages of the ages. Amen.
